verses.roman:
śaraṇa lañā kare kṛṣṇe ātma-samarpaṇa
kṛṣṇa tāre kare tat-kāle ātma-sama

synonyms: śaraṇa lañā—taking shelter; kare—does; kṛṣṇe—unto Kṛṣṇa; ātma-samarpaṇa—fully surrendering; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; tāre—him; kare—makes; tat-kāle—immediately; ātma-sama—one of His confidential associates.
translation: "When a devotee thus fully surrenders unto Kṛṣṇa's lotus feet, Kṛṣṇa accepts him as one of His confidential associates.
